ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Hardware
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh not to brag or anything but I have no lag in the Bazaar..gotta love DSL...I don t really remember the hardware stats on my PC but it has top of the
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh not to brag or anything but I have no lag in the Bazaar..gotta love
DSL...I don't really remember the hardware stats on my PC but it has top of
the line stuff as of November 02 and I love it. My friend made it for me
and it cost me just about $1600. I have 1Gigabyte of RAM and THX Surround
Sound Speakers (I love the subwoofer) and my case is all black alliumun
(excuse my spelling) and it has a blue light inside the see-thru case that
is sound activated so whenever you make noise or play music it flashes. The
front of my case has this twin lava lamp sotra thing that goes from blue,
green, and red. My mouse is see thru optical with a blue light and my whole
computer is all black and my moniter is a 15 inch flat screen. Heh I only
got one of those cheap office chairs that has wheels and spins around but it
works for me. Well thats it, talk to you guys later!

Happy Hunting!

-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Monday, August 11, 2003 6:52 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hardware



I have yet to meet someone who has not lagged in the bazaar.
luv,
-Su


> I play on a laptop: P4 1.19GHz, 512MB RAM, GeoForce2Go video card,
> Windows XP. I have a TERRIBLE lag in Bazaar, and sometimes in PoK.
> You guys think I should upgrade my video card? I know Sony doesn't
> support playing on a laptop, but aside from the lag in those two
> areas, it's working quite well.
